attributes.action: Change The Awful Design Of The Olympics Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have read the recent comments on the London 2012 Logo which quite frankly is dreadful and a huge waste of public money. I am calling for the Logo to be withdrawn before we get to ridiculed by the rest of the world and introduce one of the great designs put forward for free by the people of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
